description: This chain illustrates the common problem of qualitative data coding being time-consuming and annoying, and the proposed AI solution to automate this process.
This chain shows the evolving understanding of AI's role from a simple task automation tool to a 'Co-researcher' or 'idea processor'.
This chain highlights the challenge of RAND's fragmented data storage and the proposed solution of data lakes or standardized data pipelines to enable large-scale AI analysis.
